DOC.brief_title: 3-AP Treating Patients With Advanced Prostate Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine response rate patient advance hormone-refractory prostate cancer treat 3-AP . - Determine toxic effect drug patient . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients receive 3-AP IV 2 hour day 1-4 . Treatment repeat every 2 week 1 year absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow every 2-3 month 1 year . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : Approximately 13-27 patient accrue study .
